short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture text from entire page or selected area

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trace.Ai is powered by Mixkey(Multi-AI, Multi-Modal system) to generate insightful responses. Whether you're researching, summarizing, or simply curious, Trace.Ai makes it simple and efficient to extract and process text directly from your browser.

Key Features:

1) Capture All Text: Extract all visible text on the current web page with a single click.
2) Select Area: Highlight a specific area to capture only the text you need.
3) Send to AI: Process the captured text by clicking the Send button. This sends the content to advanced AI models, which analyze and generate detailed insights, summaries, or answers. The results are displayed directly in the extension and automatically copied to your clipboard for convenience.
4) Clipboard Integration: Use the Send feature to copy AI-generated responses for quick sharing or storage.

How It Works:

1) Use Ctrl + Shift + Z to activate the extension.
2) Choose between "Capture All" or "Select Area" to gather text.
3) Click the Send button to analyze the captured text with AI.
4) Review the AI-generated response in the results section or clipboard.

Download Trace.Ai now and experience the future of smart browsing!
